subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Essence Carson’s college career is coming to an end, but her impact will be felt long after she is gone, and the Scarlet Knights aren’t going away soon.
snippet: Essence Carson’s college career is coming to an end, but her impact will be felt long after she is gone, and the Scarlet Knights aren’t going away soon.
